pageContext.claim: “Last year, we saw the biggest increase in manufacturing jobs in more than 20 years.”
pageContext.analysis: This claim is accurate when measuring calendar years (January to December). However, because the number of manufacturing jobs is reported on a monthly basis, it's possible to measure any 12-month period and not just calendar years. Manufacturing jobs grew at a slightly faster pace during some 12-month periods immediately following the end of the Great Recession in 2009.
